an6.53:4.1: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an6.53:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an6.53:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an6.53:5.1: “Atthi nu kho, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:5.2: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko”ti?
an6.53:5.3: “Atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:5.4: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko”ti.
an6.53:6.1: “Katamo pana, bho gotama, eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato yo ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:6.2: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko”ti?
an6.53:6.3: “Appamādo kho, brāhmaṇa, eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:6.4: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko.
an6.53:7.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti;
an6.53:7.3: Evamevaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, appamādo eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:7.4: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko. (1)
an6.53:8.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, kūṭāgārassa yā kāci gopānasiyo sabbā tā kūṭaṅgamā kūṭaninnā kūṭasamosaraṇā, kūṭaṃ tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
an6.53:9.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, pabbajalāyako pabbajaṃ lāyitvā agge gahetvā odhunāti nidhunāti nicchādeti;
an6.53:10.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, ambapiṇḍiyā vaṇṭacchinnāya yāni kānici ambāni vaṇṭūpanibandhanāni sabbāni tāni tadanvayāni bhavanti;
an6.53:11.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, ye keci khuddarājāno sabbete rañño cakkavattissa anuyantā bhavanti, rājā tesaṃ cakkavattī aggamakkhāyati;
an6.53:12.1: Seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, yā kāci tārakarūpānaṃ pabhā sabbā tā candassa pabhāya kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ, candappabhā tāsaṃ aggamakkhāyati;
an6.53:12.2: evamevaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, appamādo eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:12.3: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ yo ca attho samparāyiko. (6)
an6.53:13.1: Ayaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, eko dhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhiggayha tiṭṭhati—
an6.53:13.2: diṭṭhadhammikañceva atthaṃ, yo ca attho samparāyiko”ti.
an6.53:14.1: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
an6.53:14.2: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
